hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn `Umar that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“If a man's property is targeted, and he is fought and fights back and is killed, he is a martyr.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قُتِلَ دُونَ مَالِهِ فَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Is Killed Defending His Property Is Martyr
